price: Urimbura buri kintu cyose (uhuye na cyo) ku bw’itegeko rya Nyagasani wawo. Nuko bucya nta kindi kigaragara usibye amatongo yabo. Uko ni ko duhana abantu b’inkozi z’ibibi.
arabic: تُدَمِّرُ كُلَّ شَيۡءِۭ بِأَمۡرِ رَبِّهَا فَأَصۡبَحُواْ لَا يُرَىٰٓ إِلَّا مَسَٰكِنُهُمۡۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: tudammiru kulla shayin bi-amri rabbihā fa-aṣbaḥū lā yurā illā masākinuhum kadhālika najzī al-qawma al-muj'rimīna
